1. Introduction¶

1.1. Title¶

Sphinx is an amazing thing! Here is the code.. This is an inline link. See the figure from the reference here Figure text. See this table too: Table Title. You can see that this is bold text while this is italic and this is verbatim, ergo the highlighted text. This is from the citation [CITATION].

1
2
3
4
5
#include <stdint.h>
myFunction (void)
{
    int x;
}

Figure text

Table Title¶

Smith John Jr. 20

Aaaand here is a note box:

Note

This is a note box.

Warning

This is a warning box..

And this is a seealso box:

See also
